import React, { Component } from "react" import Loading from "../general/Loading" import { makePostRequest } from "../api_calls" import AddOptions from "../general/form_components/AddOptions" import Navbar from "./Navbar"; class AddBusiness extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { loading: false, business_name: '', code: '', instagram: '', location: '', paypal: '', call_time: '' } } handleChange = (e) => { this.setState({ [e.target.id]: e.target.value }, () => { console.log(this.state) } ) } handleSubmit = () => { console.log('submitting') makePostRequest('admin/add-business', this.state, (response) => { console.log(response) console.log('done') this.props.closeSlideUp() } ) } render() { var isValid = this.state.business_name && this.state.instagram console.log(isValid) return ( <>
Add a business!
Business Name
Instagram
Instagram Password
Location
{/*
Paypal
Call time
*/}
{/*

React Stripe Elements Example

 */}
) } } export default AddBusiness
